properties.entry: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT MEMBER.MEMBER_NO, MEMBER.MEMBER_ID, NICKNAME, MEMBER.ENROLL_DATE, MEMBER.MEMBER_TYPE,REPORT_NO, NVL(BOARD_COUNT,0) BOARD_COUNT, NVL(REPLY_COUNT,0) REPLY_COUNT, NVL(RE_REPLY_COUNT,0) RE_REPLY_COUNT, NVL(POINT_SUM,0) POINT_SUM FROM MEMBER LEFT JOIN (SELECT MEMBER_NO, COUNT(*) BOARD_COUNT FROM MAIN_BOARD GROUP BY MEMBER_NO) B ON (MEMBER.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT MEMBER_NO, COUNT(*) REPLY_COUNT FROM REPLY GROUP BY MEMBER_NO) R ON(MEMBER.MEMBER_NO = R.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT MEMBER_NO, COUNT(*) RE_REPLY_COUNT FROM RE_REPLY GROUP BY MEMBER_NO) RR ON(MEMBER.MEMBER_NO = RR.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT MEMBER_NO, SUM(POINT) POINT_SUM FROM POINT GROUP BY MEMBER_NO) P ON(MEMBER.MEMBER_NO = P.MEMBER_NO) ORDER BY MEMBER.MEMBER_NO) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_TYPE = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT FILE_NO, MEMBER_ATTACH.MEMBER_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH FROM MEMBER_ATTACH JOIN MEMBER ON (MEMBER_ATTACH.MEMBER_NO = MEMBER.MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER.MEMBER_TYPE = 'A' ORDER BY MEMBER_NO) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT MEMBER.MEMBER_NO, MEMBER.MEMBER_ID, NICKNAME, MEMBER.ENROLL_DATE, MEMBER.MEMBER_TYPE,REPORT_NO, NVL(BOARD_COUNT,0) BOARD_COUNT, NVL(REPLY_COUNT,0) REPLY_COUNT, NVL(RE_REPLY_COUNT,0) RE_REPLY_COUNT, NVL(POINT_SUM,0) POINT_SUM FROM MEMBER LEFT JOIN (SELECT MEMBER_NO, COUNT(*) BOARD_COUNT FROM MAIN_BOARD GROUP BY MEMBER_NO) B ON (MEMBER.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT MEMBER_NO, COUNT(*) REPLY_COUNT FROM REPLY GROUP BY MEMBER_NO) R ON(MEMBER.MEMBER_NO = R.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT MEMBER_NO, COUNT(*) RE_REPLY_COUNT FROM RE_REPLY GROUP BY MEMBER_NO) RR ON(MEMBER.MEMBER_NO = RR.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT MEMBER_NO, SUM(POINT) POINT_SUM FROM POINT GROUP BY MEMBER_NO) P ON(MEMBER.MEMBER_NO = P.MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_ID LIKE '%'||?||'%' ORDER BY MEMBER.MEMBER_NO

SELECT MEMBER.MEMBER_NO, MEMBER.MEMBER_ID, NICKNAME, MEMBER.ENROLL_DATE, MEMBER.MEMBER_TYPE,REPORT_NO, NVL(BOARD_COUNT,0) BOARD_COUNT, NVL(REPLY_COUNT,0) REPLY_COUNT, NVL(RE_REPLY_COUNT,0) RE_REPLY_COUNT, NVL(POINT_SUM,0) POINT_SUM FROM MEMBER LEFT JOIN (SELECT MEMBER_NO, COUNT(*) BOARD_COUNT FROM MAIN_BOARD GROUP BY MEMBER_NO) B ON (MEMBER.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT MEMBER_NO, COUNT(*) REPLY_COUNT FROM REPLY GROUP BY MEMBER_NO) R ON(MEMBER.MEMBER_NO = R.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT MEMBER_NO, COUNT(*) RE_REPLY_COUNT FROM RE_REPLY GROUP BY MEMBER_NO) RR ON(MEMBER.MEMBER_NO = RR.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT MEMBER_NO, SUM(POINT) POINT_SUM FROM POINT GROUP BY MEMBER_NO) P ON(MEMBER.MEMBER_NO = P.MEMBER_NO) WHERE NICKNAME LIKE '%'||?||'%' ORDER BY MEMBER.MEMBER_NO

SELECT MEMBER.MEMBER_NO, MEMBER.MEMBER_ID, NICKNAME, MEMBER.ENROLL_DATE, MEMBER.MEMBER_TYPE,REPORT_NO, NVL(BOARD_COUNT,0) BOARD_COUNT, NVL(REPLY_COUNT,0) REPLY_COUNT, NVL(RE_REPLY_COUNT,0) RE_REPLY_COUNT, NVL(POINT_SUM,0) POINT_SUM FROM MEMBER LEFT JOIN (SELECT MEMBER_NO, COUNT(*) BOARD_COUNT FROM MAIN_BOARD GROUP BY MEMBER_NO) B ON (MEMBER.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT MEMBER_NO, COUNT(*) REPLY_COUNT FROM REPLY GROUP BY MEMBER_NO) R ON(MEMBER.MEMBER_NO = R.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT MEMBER_NO, COUNT(*) RE_REPLY_COUNT FROM RE_REPLY GROUP BY MEMBER_NO) RR ON(MEMBER.MEMBER_NO = RR.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT MEMBER_NO, SUM(POINT) POINT_SUM FROM POINT GROUP BY MEMBER_NO) P ON(MEMBER.MEMBER_NO = P.MEMBER_NO) WHERE REPORT_NO > 0 ORDER BY MEMBER.REPORT_NO DESC
